professional_snapshot: Nihal is a highly skilled Full Stack Developer with 1 year of experience in the manufacturing and logistics industries. He has a strong technical foundation in Python, React, Vue, Node.js, AWS, AI/ML, IoT, and DevOps. Nihal is also proficient in UI/UX design and has a proven track record of leading cross-functional teams and delivering high-quality software solutions.
unique_selling_points: Strong technical skills in Python, React, Vue, Node.js, AWS, AI/ML, IoT, and DevOps
Experience in leading cross-functional teams and delivering high-quality software solutions
Strong understanding of UI/UX principles and ability to design user-centric interfaces
career_narrative: Nihal began his career as a Graduate Apprentice at Central Manufacturing Technology Institute, where he developed cutting-edge dashboards and websites using the latest web technologies. He then joined the same organization as a Full Stack Developer, where he led teams of 5-6 developers and delivered tailored software solutions for manufacturing and logistics industries.
technical_expertise_summary: Nihal has a strong technical foundation in Python, React, Vue, Node.js, AWS, AI/ML, IoT, and DevOps. He is proficient in using these technologies to develop and deploy scalable web and mobile applications, integrate AI/ML and IoT solutions, and streamline deployment and development processes.
soft_skills_summary: Nihal is a highly motivated and results-oriented individual with strong leadership and communication skills. He is able to work independently and as part of a team, and is always willing to go the extra mile to get the job done.

Designed and integrated IoT solutions with sensors and data analytics, increasing process optimization efficiency by 10 percent
